Head: OZAENA; frontal pain
Influenza, with aching pains all over, and heat in the limbs
Occipital pain, with nausea on rising, followed by vomiting
Stomach: Loathing of food; nausea on rising, followed by vomiting and cramps
Extremities: Stiffness of all joints; calves numbs; aching in bones

name: Triosteum perfoliatum
details: Triosteum is a very valuable remedy in diarrhoea attended with colic pains and nausea, NUMBNESS OF LOWER LIMBS AFTER STOOL, and increased flow of urine; also in influenza. Quiets nervous symptoms. (COFFEA.; HYOS.) Biliousness. Bilious colic.
